member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GasSense
member.summary: A GasSense module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GasSense.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GasSense.ReadVoltage
member.summary: The voltage returned from the sensor.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GasSense.ReadProportion

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GasSense.HeatingElementEnabled
member.summary: Turns the heating element on or off. This may take up to 10 seconds befre a proper reading is taken.
